sentence.Network_en: The platform deposits and rocks footwall are affected by fault tectonics.
sentence.Network_cn: 台地沉积与岩石底壁处都受到了断层构造的影响.

sentence.Network_en: The heavy oil is distributed at handing wall, light oil and gas reservoir at the footwall.
sentence.Network_cn: 稠油主要分布在断阶带上盘, 正常油和轻质油分布在断阶带的下盘及断阶带之间.

sentence.Network_en: But footwall, the mineralization type transformed into altered rock type and quartz vein type.
sentence.Network_cn: 当远离招平断裂带时, 矿化类型为石英脉型,产状近直立甚至倒转.
